name: newschart
description: Simple charting tool for news rooms

scripts.dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_TEMPLATE_TYPE=${npm_package_config_template_type} WEBPACK_TEMPLATE_COMPRESS=false webpack-dev-server --config ./build/webpack.config.js --open
scripts.dist: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production WEBPACK_TEMPLATE_TYPE=${npm_package_config_template_type} npm run dist:${npm_package_config_template_type}
scripts.dist:lib: npm run dist:uncompressed && npm run dist:compressed
scripts.inst:app: npm run inst:save && npm run inst:save_dev
scripts.inst:save_dev: npm i babel-core babel-loader babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx babel-plugin-transform-runtime babel-polyfill babel-preset-es2015 css-loader file-loader handlebars handlebars-loader html-webpack-plugin http-server node-sass postcss postcss-cssnext postcss-loader rimraf sass-loader style-loader url-loader webpack webpack-dev-server --save-dev

author: Chan Young Park (http://chanyoungpark.com)
